text.style: font-family: sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12pt; stroke-width: 1px; stroke: oklch(0% 0 0 / 1); stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; fill: oklch(0% 0 0 / 1);
